title: Psyche a tragedy / written by Tho. Shadwell.
author: Shadwell, Thomas, 1642?-1692.
publisher: Printed by T.N. for Henry Herringman ...,
notes: Considered by some to be the first English opera.  Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Includes untitled songs without the music by Matthew Locke and Draghi.  Cf. New Grove.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
